text: Liz Torres (born September 27, 1947) is an American actress, singer, and comedian from The Bronx, New York City, New York. She played Mahalia Sanchez in the comedy show The John Larroquette Show and also played Teresa Betancourt in All in the Family. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1947 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from the Bronx Category:Singers from New York City Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Living people
title: Liz Torres
